title: Where does copying a text go? - Quora

response.answer_text: It goes to your operating system's clipboard. Just think of it as reserved space for thing you copied. The way it works is the thing you copied gets copied to the clipboard. Then whenever you paste, it copies whatever is in the clipboard and put it to wherever you pasted it to. The clipboard does not get cleared though, so you are allowed to paste more than once. If you copy another thing, then the clipboard gets replaced with the new thing.
